Class MainMenuView

java.lang.Object
view.abstracts.ARenderView
view.MainMenuView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class MainMenuView extends ARenderView implements ViewInterface
MainMenuView provides the main menu interface for the BTO Management System. It displays different options based on the user's role and handles navigation.
